sections.heading: Counsel; complaint; conclusion or recommendation; consult with agency or person
sections.text: Before announcing a conclusion or recommendation that expressly or impliedly criticizes an administrative agency or any person, the Public Counsel shall consult with such agency or person.SourceLaws 1969, c. 762, ยง 9, p.

50-2010.Public Counsel; complaint; conclusion or recommendation; consult with agency or person.

Before announcing a conclusion or recommendation that expressly or impliedly criticizes an administrative agency or any person, the Public Counsel shall consult with such agency or person.

SourceLaws 1969, c. 762, ยง 9, p. 2882;R.S.1943, (2024), ยง 81-8,248;Laws 2025, LB298, ยง 10.Effective Date: June 5, 2025
